text:
June 18, 1957
TOi Frank Schooley
FROM: Burton Paulu
cc: Robert S. Schenkkan
I am enclosing for your information a copy of a letter
from Bob Schenkkan of May 23 which deals in part with a
membership drive. I realize that you were not at the
Columbus luncheon to which this comment refers, so that you
do not know exactly what Willsea was referring to; but I
thought you would like to see Schenkkan*s comment anyway.
